verses.name: 1 Kings 5:15
verses.text: And Solomon had threescore and ten thousand that bare burdens, and fourscore thousand hewers in the mountains;

verses.name: 1 Kings 5:16
verses.text: Beside the chief of Solomon’s officers which were over the work, three thousand and three hundred, which ruled over the people that wrought in the work.

verses.name: 1 Kings 5:17
verses.text: And the king commanded, and they brought great stones, costly stones, and hewed stones, to lay the foundation of the house.

verses.name: 1 Kings 5:18
verses.text: And Solomon’s builders and Hiram’s builders did hew them, and the stonesquarers: so they prepared timber and stones to build the house.
